# items

**Instance Property**

Returns the set of dynamic items you’ve added to the push behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [any UIDynamicItem] { get }
```

## Initializing and managing a push behavior

- **active**: The state of the push behavior’s force: either active or inactive.
- **addItem(_:)**: Adds a dynamic item to the behavior’s dynamic item array.
- **init(items:mode:)**: Initializes a push behavior with an array of dynamic items.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes a specific dynamic item from the behavior.

items.description: The state of the push behavior’s force: either active or inactive.
